pageContent: Objective: To analyze clinical and dosimetric factors involved in prostate-specific antigen bounce in patients who underwent permanent implant brachytherapy for localized prostate cancer, and to study the relationships among prostate-specific antigen bounce, age and sexual function.

metaData.source:
Promoting Sexual Well-being for Men and Their Partners Affected by Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32674972/
